name: Send SurveySparrow links to emails from Google Forms
description: Every time a new Google Forms response is submitted, Make will automatically create a survey link in SurveySparrow and send it to the email address from the Google Forms response. This example uses [this sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1I_0ORbuaKUyehO5qj7l3iWRNYELfAuG5lQzLfyuSw9A/edit#gid=0).
